00053     class TAGLIB_EXPORT File : public TagLib::File
00054     {
00055     public:
00060       enum TagTypes {
00062         NoTags  = 0x0000,
00064         ID3v1   = 0x0001,
00066         ID3v2   = 0x0002,
00068         APE     = 0x0004,
00070         AllTags = 0xffff
00071       };
00072 
00081       File(FileName file, bool readProperties = true,
00082            Properties::ReadStyle propertiesStyle = Properties::Average);
00083 
00093       File(FileName file, ID3v2::FrameFactory *frameFactory,
00094            bool readProperties = true,
00095            Properties::ReadStyle propertiesStyle = Properties::Average);
00096 
00103       // BIC: merge with the above constructor
00104       File(IOStream *stream, ID3v2::FrameFactory *frameFactory,
00105            bool readProperties = true,
00106            Properties::ReadStyle propertiesStyle = Properties::Average);
00107 
00111       virtual ~File();
00112 
00130       virtual Tag *tag() const;
00131 
00138       PropertyMap properties() const;
00139 
00140       void removeUnsupportedProperties(const StringList &properties);
00141 
00147       PropertyMap setProperties(const PropertyMap &);
00148 
00153       virtual Properties *audioProperties() const;
00154 
00170       virtual bool save();
00171 
00181       bool save(int tags);
00182 
00192       // BIC: combine with the above method
00193       bool save(int tags, bool stripOthers);
00194 
00207       // BIC: combine with the above method
00208       bool save(int tags, bool stripOthers, int id3v2Version);
00209 
00221       ID3v2::Tag *ID3v2Tag(bool create = false);
00222 
00234       ID3v1::Tag *ID3v1Tag(bool create = false);
00235 
00247       APE::Tag *APETag(bool create = false);
00248 
00259       bool strip(int tags = AllTags);
00260 
00269       // BIC: merge with the method above
00270       bool strip(int tags, bool freeMemory);

00282       long firstFrameOffset();

00289

00295

00300

00304
